jobs.title: Advisor - Sales (3-5 years)- Cement/Tyres/FMCG/Steel/TMT - Consulting Firm - Contractual
jobs.description:
Our client (one of the large global management consulting firm) has asked us to help them with Sales and Marketing experienced in Cement, Tyres, FMCG, etc. (Skilled in Sales & Marketing, Leadership, Customer Service) for one of their large consulting engagement in India. This will be 4 months of contractual role.

Our client (consulting firm) is undertaking a large Sales strategy transformation or improvement program in a large Cement Industry in India. The program involves improvements in sales and marketing and looks at Sales improvement opportunities. The program is for 2 years and already there is a team of consultants carrying out analysis and improvement idea generations on the ground. Now, there is a need of a strong Sales and Marketing, who can collate all improvement initiatives that are ongoing and provide timely insights to the consulting team on the implementation gaps and action needed

Opportunity to work with the TIER 1 management consulting firm.

Requirements - 

- Sales experience of 3-5 years; Preference to work done in Cement, Automotive aftermarket sales

- Open to traveling with a minimum commitment of 6 months with up to a 2-year engagement.

- Contact and ensure to qualify identified prospects, leads, and suspects from established marketing campaigns plus current business partner relations.

- Conduct initial onsite, remote demonstrations and detailed follow-up demonstrations customized to show how solution attains particular prospect requirements.

- Stimulate sales activities to attain or exceed revenue objectives on a monthly, quarterly and yearly basis.

- Update and maintain continuously internal marketing database to precisely reflect sales activities and prospect status.

- Support preparation of perfect monthly, quarterly and yearly sales projection along with pipeline reports.

- Assist partner distribution networks associated with distribution plus the promotion of organization materials.

- Prepare marketing plans determining specific organization product family needs.

- Develop market and competitive analysis, pricing schedules, forecasts, promotional plus advertising requirements.

- Develop and coordinate promotional as well as collateral materials like brochures, videos, binders, and trade show graphics, etc.

- Support marketing and sales programs together with Sales & Marketing Manager, Europe as well as Domestic Marketing team.

- Support incorporates plus product branding at international conventions and trade shows.

- Conduct account maintenance, inquiry calls, outside sales calls, qualification calls, concierge visits, site visits and varied sales activities.

- Prepare, plan and implement local marketing events, strategies and initiatives to enforce bar, boardroom and dining room sales.

- Plan and implement corporate events as defined in standard operating procedures.

- Execute accurately all organization initiatives, policies plus procedures to improve quality, operations and service.

jobs.title: Advisor/Consultant - Contract Manufacturing- Global Management Consulting firm
jobs.description:
We are working with one of the leading management consulting firm (TIER 1) carrying out the business transformation for one of their clients in Automotive Rubber products manufacturing. The client needs to augment their team with an Advisor/Consultant who knows and has dealt with contract manufacturers and can advise the client on their contract manufacturing strategy. The Advisor will work on a contract of 3 months (extendable based on project requirement) with the consulting firm.

Travel, Lodging, and boarding will be taken care of the consulting firm

Responsibilities:

- Identify contract manufacturers for rubber products

- Validate their credentials and capabilities (e.g., floor walkthroughs)

- Designing the terms and conditions of the contract to be signed with the contract manufacturers

- Regularly validate and test the quality of products, pricing, delivery, etc.

- Visiting Clients' Offices for Meetings.

- Overall Client Interaction.

- Interaction with various Departments at Mfg. Units

Desired Skills:

- Servicing clients (Rubber Companies).

- Having knowledge of Contract Manufacturing.

- Identification of clients / finalizing products.

jobs.title: Lead User Researcher
jobs.description:
user researchers work closely with UX designers and Product Managers (PM).They gather user-feedback around features and turn them into insights for designers, PMs and engineers. They help validate and evaluate ideas and prototypes. Researchers are the voice of the customer. They help everyone at organization to develop a deep empathy and understanding of our customers. User researchers are responsible for running all formats of research — from planning and scoping through execution, final delivery, and presentation.

What are we looking for?

•Expert knowledge and substantial experience of leading research initiatives:
•Ability and experience of managing all aspects of research — from recruiting to running research sessions, analysis to presenting findings to stakeholders
•Ability to engage with the product and design teams to identify needs early and to translate them into a research plan
•Proficiency in running various research methods (ethnographic studies, contextual enquiries, usability studies, etc.) based on the project context
•Excellent communication skills. Ability to document and present research findings in a clear, confident, professional, and cogent manner
•Ability to actively seek out and collaborate with UX designers
•Ability to handle open-ended research projects that may be ambiguous or ill-defined
•Ability to manage the work of other researchers

jobs.title: Micro Interaction Designer
jobs.description:
**Key Responsibilities and Accountability**
● Crafting delightful micro-interactions and transitions across our various platforms
Collaboration with teams of product designers, engineers and product managers
● throughout the design process – from creation to production
● Staying abreast of the latest UX trends and looking for creative ideas and inspiration in
parallel analogous worlds
● Creation of rapid prototypes to validate design concepts
Skills & Competencies
● Self-starter who is a customer-obsessed, detail-oriented, and an enthusiastic team
player
● Knowledge of building user-experiences for mobile apps across mobile & web
application
● Mastery of Sketch, Principle and Adobe After Effects
● One must be able to confidently articulate UX design rationale and enjoy leading
conversations with teams and key stakeholders
● Detail orientation, execution excellence & entrepreneurial spirit
● Ability to work on tight schedules
● Excellent verbal and communication skills
Required Qualifications
● 5+ years of industry experience

Required Qualifications
● 5+ years of industry experience

jobs.title: Senior Manager - Lean Manufacturing.
jobs.description:
Our client (one of the large global management consulting firm) has asked us to help them with the Senior Manager - Lean Manufacturing.

Our Client, The consulting company, with operations in the United States, Europe, and Asia, is a recognized leader in delivering proven business and IT strategies and solutions to Global 2000 companies across many industries. With a balanced view of strategy, people, process and technology, they work with companies to understand their unique business needs and to develop and implement practical business strategies and technology solutions. From business strategy development through application deployment, their consultants are committed to helping clients quickly realize measurable business value and achieve sustainable ROI. Their offerings can be broadly classified into:

a) Management Consulting,

(b) Technology Solutions and

(c) Managed Services.

About the practice

The Consulting firm follows a value-based consulting approach to deliver measurable, sustainable business results and a better consulting experience. Their core offerings in the digital consulting space:

Job Description:

ROLE: Senior Manager Lean Manufacturing & Digital Manufacturing

Department: Management Consulting Firm INO

Location: Pune

Job Responsibilities:

- Lead engagement delivery for customers in India and abroad as appropriate.

- Lead/ drive insights from the deep-dive assessment at the client site

- Proposal preparation and bring strong insights out of the data analysis

- Understand the intersection between technology, customers and business to grow revenue and cultivate business development opportunities.

- Help customers understand the best mix of technologies, design solutions and services and how they should be delivered to maximize effectiveness.

- Building a consultative partnership with the customer, develop a roadmap and plan to implement engagements to solve customer's problems.

- Contribute towards 3-4 thought leaderships in a fiscal

- Contribute towards Knowledge management within the organization

- Stay abreast of current and emerging digital trends, unique opportunities and challenges of space/ markets and geographies in which the customers operate, and how it affects customer's business and initiatives.

Desired Skills :



1. A Minimum of 9-12 years of Management Consulting and Industry experience with a minimum of 5-6 years with one of the Big 4s- / Tier 1 Management Consulting firms.

2. Strong background/ understanding of Lean and Six Sigma techniques and having hands-on experience of implemented Operations improvement and ME (Manufacturing Excellence) projects

3. Demonstrate strong functional understanding of processes, systems, and megatrends around one or more focused industries (Industry Focus: Automotive, Metals and Mining, FMCG and Industrials)

4. Hands-on experience of statistical tools (Minitab or statistics) and can guide the execution/delivery team on data insights, analytical viewpoints, alternate methods/ techniques of problem-solving.

5. Expertise in methodologies like TQM, Deming, QFD, FMEA

6. Be the focal point for delivering end-to-end consulting projects for clients in the areas of Productivity enhancement, cost optimization, maintenance and asset management, inventory and change management

7. Strong problem solver and creative thinker

8. Ability to operate at the strategic level yet being close enough to the details to add value to customers and be a real support to the execution team.

9. Strong interpersonal and communication skills.

10. Track record of leading teams, Proven ability to manage client engagements under high stress to successful completion
